transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello vanakkam sollunga
Executive: Vanakkam sir Pooja pesuren sir India martla irunthu
Customer: Sollunga
Executive: Hello atha sir customer care call pannirukinga enna issue sir call pannirukinga
Customer: Illama ipo naan kettathukku avanga enna solranga neenga inga enakku India martla irunthu yaroo call pannanga enakku
Customer: Naan three months renewal panna enakku idea illanga naan athukku apram thaan idea irukku appadinnu solren unga account terminate aagum appadinnu oruthar solraru yaaru avarunnu naan enakku theriyala naan athaan India mart helpline call pannen
Executive: Seri actually enna naan avar ennodaa manager thaan ok va naan ithukku munnadi unga kitta pesi irukken nyabagam irukkaa trustil sollittu onnu pesi irunthen la
Customer: Seringa
Executive: Ok va pesi irukken naan enakku sollunga
Executive: That actually enna issue naan ippo nammalukku neenga vanthu renewal panna maattennu sonningala
Customer: Renewal pannalaingirathu vanthu issueve kidayathu maa athu ennodaa viruppam athu athai yen issueinguranga
Executive: Avar yen athai sonnaarunnaa vanthu neenga andha ippo neenga renewal pannama vittutingannu vachikonga unga end date mudinjuruchinnaa thiruppiyum neenga vanthu join aaguringannaa same GST vachi ungalaala join aaga mudiyathu avar fact thaan solraru
Customer: Illa athu eppadi thirumbi athe en account thaan ulla irukkungale maa naan appadi eppadi marubadiyum en GST vachi join aaga mudiyathu
Executive: Athu fullaave ungalukku close aayidum neenga ippo innikki oru 25
Customer: Appo naan renewal pannama actually premium pay pannama India martla irunthunnaa naan evlo naal venaalum irukkalaam enakku athile nalla enquiry vanthuttu irunthuchingale
Executive: Ippo neenga by leads edukaama India martla irunthu
Customer: Illa illa by leadske vitturunga premiumme vitturunga premium pay pannama naan oru India mart account vachi irunthen athulirunthu enakku normalaave leads nariya vanthathu
Executive: Ippo andha maari kidayathu sir ippo edukka mudiyathu ippo free neenga free launch thaan kekkiringa sir amount pay pannama irukkurathu ippo andha maari illa sir by leads edukka mudiyathu andha maari irunthingannaa by leads edukka mudiyathu ungalukku by leadsme relevanttaa varaathu ippo yen solraangannaa ippo once neenga vanthu renewal pannama vittutinga again neenga ippo puthusa renewal panni vareenga appadinnnaa ungalukku vanthu same munnadi relevanttaa vanthuttu irunthuchilla ippo neenga eduthu irukkinga by leads correct thaanla 25th thethilaam eduthu irukkinga so ungalukku by leads relevanttaa varaama stop aayidum appa neenga again again use panna use pannathaan ungalukku relevanttaa varum ippo neenga already almost use pannittu irukkinga athai neenga appadiye maintain pannalume yennaa appadiye maintain pannalume ungalukku relevanttaa illa sir India mart naan customer helplinela call pannumbothu entha issuevum kidayathu neenga appadiye onnum problem illa appadinnu avanga solraanga
Customer: Seringala neenga intha side la irunthu solluringa illa avanga avanga kitta naan intha help enakku intha issue mattum enakku sollunga appadinnu sonnathukku avanga intha maari sonnaanga
Executive: Seringala athu enna naan appadithaan sir ungalukku ok va yennaa nammakku ippo renewalme vanthuruchu ok va renewal vanthathunaala renewal vanthurukkumaa naan enna solrennaa renewal vanthurukku naan renewal pannarathukku time kekkiren moonu maasam aagum naan thanavula thaan renewal pannuven
Customer: Seringala ippo athaan moonu maasam neenga aagumnu solringale neenga ippo pannuningaa issue kidayathu yen ippo naanga munnadiye call panni ungalukku inform pannromnaa yennaa ippo ungalukku financial yearme varuthu correct thaanla financial yearkku price ellaame change aaguthu so athanaalathaan naanga ungalukkunnu illa ellaa clientukkume naanga call panni athai inform panni same price la illa aanaa avar pesunathe en kitta oruthar pesunaarilla avar pesunathe sariyaa illingale
Executive: Ok avar tone ungalukku sariyaa illainnu solringaa correct thaanla illa tonaa ennanu theriyala avar speeche oru maariyaa irunthathu pannaanaa terminate aayidum athaayidum ithulaam ennanu ithu ennanu puriyala naan panam kattaren naan India mart use pannaren thevaikku naan use pannikkiren
Customer: Ok enakku puriyuthu sir sorry sir appadi inform enakku ennaanaa ok avar vanthu avar tone vanthu ungalukku athu hit aagalainnu ninaikkiren naan inform panren ok va avar kittayume avar just oru concernkaagathaan solraaru yennaa vanthu naanga un ellaarukkume naanga call panni intimate panni illa maa enakku puriyuthu ungalukku evlo pressure irukkum ungalukku target irukkum seringala athulaam vanthu neenga vanthu customer kitta kaatta koodaathu la
Customer: Actually target illa sir yennaa price ippo vanthu neenga pay panni illa illa price laam neenga pesaathinga enakku theriyum target thaan ungalukku main seringaa first motto target next neenga ponath tharava price enna pannirunthinga sir yennaa naan ungalukku ponath tharava sonnappo trustil naan solliruppen correct thaanla ippo athu price change aayiduchu one yearkke paathingannaa 60 plus GSTndrathu irukku ippo naan athanaalathaan solren price ippo ponath tharava neenga pannumbothu evlo price pannirunthinga seri naan veliye oru nimisham naan check panren irungannaa paakkiren ponath tharava neenga panna price ippo price increase aayiduchu athanaalathaan same pricekku ungalukku panni kodukkalaam sir ippo panningaannaa appadinnu sollittu naanga update pannurathu
Customer: Puriyuthula avar pesuna tone venaa ungalukku ok illa appadinnu neenga solringaa pona tharava naan mail solra alavukku poitten naan enakku pesuna vithame enakku suthamaa enakku ithaagala seringala 32 plus GST 32 plus GST vanthu pay pannirukkinga correct thaanla aamaa 37000 ippo vanthu ungalukku price vanthu change aaguthu ennaanaa 35 plus GST change aaguthu appa neenga renewal pannarathu paathingannaa kittathatta 42000 kitta vanthurum ungalukku GST ellaame sernthu so neenga ippo panningaannaa 32 plus GSTndrathu irukkum same 37 naan ungalukku panni koduppen athanaalathaan ungalukku ketten illannaa avar pesuna tone ungalukku theriyalaannaa naan inform panren avar kitta ok va naan intimate naan yennaa en numberlirunthu call pannaa neenga edukka maattiringa actually illa edukkalainnaalum maa neenga innoru numberlirunthu koopidurengirathu enakku puriyalaiyaa enakku athu seri thappu illaiyaa athu naan ungalukku follow panni naanum actually naanum rendu telecaller vachi irukken seringala actually enna naan sir naan thaan unga account manager ennai thavira vera yaarum ungalukku call panna maattaanga enna naan ungalukku pona monthlirunthu actually naan neriya try pannitten neenga yen call edukka maattiringannu sollittu saami yennaa service wiseme naangathaan ungalukku kodukkanum payment wise ok va service wiseme naangathaan ungalukku provide pannuvom but neenga athukkume call edukkaatha vachathulathaan naan ungalukku vera numberlirunthu call panren yennaa naan yen numberlirunthu call pannaa full ring poittinga edukka maattiringa enakku theriyuthu full ring poittu irukkumbothu but call edukka maattiringa athu ethanaala saami varathunaala edukka maattiringalaa enna issueinnu theriyala yennaa naan whatsapplume ungalukku message potrupen illa naan yen edukkalainnaa neenga by leads consume panna maattiringa by leads consume panna maattiringannu thirumba thirumba daily enakku call panraanga seringala athu daily call panrathu ethukunaa ippo naanga oru solutionme kodukkurom neenga by leads consume panna maattiringa busyyaa irukkingannu sollunga naanga enna pannromnaa ungalukku whatsapp groupndrathu create panrom ok va unga manager naanum neenga irukkura maari create pannippom dailyume ungalukku naanga rendu by leads eduthu send pannuvom athai mattum consume pannalaam neenga ulla poittu search panni paakkanumnu avasiyam kidayathu naangale enna pannuvomnaa rendu by leadsndrathu unga kitta kettu enna enna location venum sir enna enna product ellaame kettuttu naangalume rendu rendu by leads eduthu ungalukku send pannuvom neenga send pannathume just andha link munnadi keela anuppuvom andha link click panni neenga just contact by naan koduthu avanga kitta neenga pesunaa mattum pothum appadi call edukkaatha vachathula neenga whatsapp use panna pannikkalaam serimaa enakku oru ten minutesla koopidunga naan freeyaa irukken ippo seri ok va seri
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a call about account termination.

- Customer says executive's tone was inappropriate.

- Customer is not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Customer is receiving too many calls.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the account termination concern.

- Executive apologized for the tone of the other executive.

- Executive offered a WhatsApp group for buylead sharing.

- Executive explained the price increase for renewal.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, buyleads, customer service, pricing, account termination
